onboarding_step1_content: To get you started, we've added 1 EUR to your balance (you can see the balance on the billing page). Use this free credit to test out our transcription service.
onboarding_step2_content: Ready to integrate? Your API key is displayed on the left side of the dashboard. On the right side of this screen, you'll find Example Integrations with simple guides for tools like n8n or Python.
onboarding_step3_content: If you prefer to test transcription quality without coding first, head over to the Playground section using the link in the left-hand menu.
onboarding_step4_content: Explore your dashboard and start building. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us on Discord.
